verses.t: And{G2532} I stood{G2476} upon{G1909} the sand{G3588} of the sea{G3588}, and{G2532} saw{G1492} a beast{G2342} rise up{G305} out of{G1537} the sea{G3588}, having{G2192} seven{G2033} heads{G2776} and{G2532} ten{G1176} horns{G2768}, and{G2532} upon{G1909} his{G846} horns{G3588} ten{G1176} crowns{G1238}, and{G2532} upon{G1909} his{G846} heads{G3588} the name{G3686} of blasphemy{G988}.

And{G2532} the beast{G3588} which{G3739} I saw{G1492} was{G2258} like unto{G3664} a leopard{G3917}, and{G2532} his{G846} feet{G3588} were as{G5613} the feet of a bear{G715}, and{G2532} his{G846} mouth{G3588} as{G5613} the mouth{G4750} of a lion{G3023}: and{G2532} the dragon{G3588} gave{G1325} him{G846} his{G846} power{G3588}, and{G2532} his{G846} seat{G3588}, and{G2532} great{G3173} authority{G1849}.

And{G2532} I saw{G1492} one{G1520} of his{G846} heads{G3588} as it were{G5613} wounded{G4969} to{G1519} death{G2288}; and{G2532} his{G846} deadly{G3588} wound{G3588} was healed{G2323}: and{G2532} all{G3650} the world{G3588} wondered{G2296} after{G3694} the beast{G3588}.

And{G2532} they worshipped{G4352} the dragon{G3588} which{G3739} gave{G1325} power{G1849} unto the beast{G3588}: and{G2532} they worshipped{G4352} the beast{G3588}, saying{G3004}, Who{G5101} is like unto{G3664} the beast{G3588}? who{G5101} is able{G1410} to make war{G4170} with{G3326} him{G846}?

And{G2532} there was given{G1325} unto him{G846} a mouth{G4750} speaking{G2980} great things{G3173} and{G2532} blasphemies{G988}; and{G2532} power{G1849} was given{G1325} unto him{G846} to continue{G4160} forty{G5062} and two{G1417} months{G3376}.

And{G2532} he opened{G455} his{G846} mouth{G3588} in{G1519} blasphemy{G988} against{G4314} God{G3588}, to blaspheme{G987} his{G846} name{G3588}, and{G2532} his{G846} tabernacle{G3588}, and{G2532} them{G3588} that dwell{G4637} in{G1722} heaven{G3588}.

And{G2532} it was given{G1325} unto him{G846} to make{G4160} war{G4171} with{G3326} the saints{G40}, and{G2532} to overcome{G3528} them{G846}and{G2532} power{G1849} was given{G1325} him{G846} over{G1909} all{G3956} kindreds{G5443}, and{G2532} tongues{G1100}, and{G2532} nations{G1484}.

And{G2532} all{G3956} that{G3588} dwell{G2730} upon{G1909} the earth{G3588} shall worship{G4352} him{G846}, whose{G3739} names{G3588} are{G1125} not{G3756} written{G1125} in{G1722} the book{G3588} of life{G3588} of the Lamb{G3588} slain{G4969} from{G575} the foundation{G2602} of the world{G2889}.
If{G1487} any man{G5100} have{G2192} an ear{G3775}, let him hear{G191}.

He{G5100} that{G1487} leadeth into{G4863} captivity{G161} shall go{G5217} into{G1519} captivity{G161}: he{G5100} that{G1487} killeth{G615} with{G1722} the sword{G3162} must{G1163} be{G846} killed{G615} with{G1722} the sword{G3162}. Here{G5602} is{G2076} the patience{G3588} and{G2532} the faith{G3588} of the saints{G40}.

And{G2532} I beheld{G1492} another{G243} beast{G2342} coming up{G305} out of{G1537} the earth{G3588}; and{G2532} he had{G2192} two{G1417} horns{G2768} like{G3664} a lamb{G721}, and{G2532} he spake{G2980} as{G5613} a dragon{G1404}.

And{G2532} he exerciseth{G4160} all{G3956} the power{G3588} of the first{G4413} beast{G2342} before{G1799} him{G846}, and{G2532} causeth{G4160} the earth{G3588} and{G2532} them{G3588} which dwell{G2730} therein{G846} to{G2443} worship{G4352} the first{G4413} beast{G3588}, whose{G3739} deadly{G3588} wound{G3588} was healed{G2323}.

And{G2532} he doeth{G4160} great{G3173} wonders{G4592}, so{G2443} that{G2532} he maketh{G4160} fire{G4442} come down{G2597} from{G1537} heaven{G3588} on{G1519} the earth{G3588} in the sight{G1799} of men{G3588},

And{G2532} deceiveth{G4105} them{G3588} that dwell{G2730} on{G1909} the earth{G3588} by{G1223} the means of those{G3588} miracles{G4592} which{G3739} he{G846} had power{G1325} to do{G4160} in the sight of{G1799} the beast{G3588}; saying{G3004} to them{G3588} that dwell{G2730} on{G1909} the earth{G3588}, that they should make{G4160} an image{G1504} to the beast{G3588}, which{G3739} had{G2192} the wound{G3588} by a sword{G3588}, and{G2532} did live{G2198}.

And{G2532} he{G846} had power{G1325} to give{G1325} life{G4151} unto the image{G3588} of the beast{G3588}, that{G2443} the image{G3588} of the beast{G3588} should{G2980} both{G2532} speak{G2980}, and{G2532} cause{G4160} that{G2443} as many{G3745} as{G302} would{G4352} not{G3361} worship{G4352} the image{G3588} of the beast{G3588} should be killed{G615}.

And{G2532} he causeth{G4160} all{G3956}, both{G2532} small{G3398} and{G2532} great{G3173}, rich{G4145} and{G2532} poor{G4434}, free{G1658} and{G2532} bond{G3588}, to{G2443} receive{G1325} a mark{G5480} in{G1909} their{G846} right{G1188} hand{G3588}, or{G2228} in{G1909} their{G846} foreheads{G3588}:

And{G2532} that{G2443} no{G3361} man{G5100} might{G1410}buy{G59} or{G2228} sell{G4453}, save he{G3361} that{G1487} had{G2192} the mark{G3588}, or{G2228} the name{G3588} of the beast{G3588}, or{G2228} the number{G3588} of his{G846} name{G3588}.

Here{G5602} is{G2076} wisdom{G3588}. Let him{G3588} that hath{G2192} understanding{G3588} count{G5585} the number{G3588} of the beast{G3588}: for{G1063} it is{G2076} the number{G706} of a man{G444}; and{G2532} his{G846} number{G3588} is Six hundred threescore{G5516} and six{G5516}.
